summary: 4WD DRIVE IS INOP. THE TRANSFER CASE AUTOMATICALLY SWITCHED TO 4 LO ON THE MOVE. THE TRUCK HAS BEEN IN 5 TIMES FOR THE SAME PROBLEM. THE DEALER AND GM SAYS THERE IS NO FIX AT THIS TIME, TIME FRAME FOR FIX IS UNKNOWN. DEALER SAYS IT CAN NOT REPLACE ENCODER BECAUSE GM WILL NOT ALLOW PARTS TO BE INSTALLED BECAUSE IT WILL NOT FIX THE PROBLEM. THIS TRUCK HAS LESS THAN 2500 MILES ON IT.
